Key Match Events: Kwadwo Duah scored the first goal for Switzerland in the 12th minute.
Michel Aebischer scored the second goal for Switzerland in the 45th minute.
Barnabás Varga scored the only goal for Hungary in the 66th minute.
Breel Embolo scored the third goal for Switzerland in the 90'+3 minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Switzerland began their Euro 2024 campaign in style with a 3-1 Group A victory over Hungary.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at RheinEnergieSTADION in Köln, Germany.
The attendance for the match was 41,676.
